body_html:
skip and take are separate API because they can only be implemented using a stateful function and stateful functions have many limitations (e.g. do not support checkpointing and preclude many static optimizations).

If you implement my suggestion, I will be happy to review the PR.
body_text:
skip and take are separate API because they can only be implemented using a stateful function and stateful functions have many limitations (e.g. do not support checkpointing and preclude many static optimizations).
If you implement my suggestion, I will be happy to review the PR.
body:
`skip` and `take` are separate API because they can only be implemented using a *stateful* function and stateful functions have many limitations (e.g. do not support checkpointing and preclude many static optimizations).

If you implement my suggestion, I will be happy to review the PR.
